document_data.mainbody:
Adil al-Jazarijja was a member of the House of Hanif tribe within the Haunted Lands in 1367 DR.
Adil was Sheikh of a smaller branch of the tribe near the Weeping Desert. His camp was attacked and put to the torch by raiders from Krak al-Niraan. Adils daughters, Dalida and Aisha were kidnapped during the raid and taken back to the castle.
